In a world where the polar bears live in the Arctic, there's one bear who dreams of a life in the sun. The polar bear, named Aurora, spends her days gazing at the horizon, longing to feel the warmth of the sun on her fur. One day, she decides to take a leap of faith and sets off on a journey to find the sun. Along the way, she meets a group of friendly seals who help her on her quest. Eventually, Aurora reaches the sun and is overjoyed by the warmth and light. She decides to stay in the sun and becomes the first polar bear to ever live in a tropical climate.
